section.title: Tracers

important.para: Spaces where introduced in log4j category name to properly render page. Please remove them when using copy/paste.

section.para: The JAIN SLEE &THIS.ENABLER; Enabler uses a single JAIN SLEE 1.1 Tracer, named SipSubscriptionClientChildSbb. The related log4j category is javax.slee.SbbNotification[service=ServiceID[name= ServiceX,vendor=VendorY,version=VersionZ], sbb=SbbID[name=SipSubscriptionClientChildSbb,vendor=org.mobicents,version=1.0]]. Where ServiceX, VendorY and VersionZ need to be replaced by the identifiers of the Service using the Enabler.

section.title: Alarms
section.para: The JAIN SLEE &THIS.ENABLER; Enabler does not sets JAIN SLEE Alarms.
